data.eml:eml: Taxonomic study of the genus Promalactis Meyrick (Lepidoptera, Oecophoridae) from Hainan Island, China (III)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Hu, Sha, Wang, Shuxia (2017): Taxonomic study of the genus Promalactis Meyrick (Lepidoptera, Oecophoridae) from Hainan Island, China (III). Zootaxa 4303 (4): 590-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4303.4.9
